para.text: Powers conferred by the governing instrument;
Except as limited by the governing instrument, any other powers necessary or convenient to carry out the activities and affairs of the statutory trust; and
Other powers conferred by this chapter.

annoGroup.heading: Effect of Amendments
annoGroup.annotation: The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 19-210 substituted “activities” for “business” in (2).

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.text: Uniform Law: This section is based on § 502 of the Uniform Statutory Trust Entity Act.
Application of Law 19-210: Section 7 of D.C. Law 19-210 provided that the act shall apply as of January 1, 2012.
